agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Licensing & Administrative Procedures TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, March 12, 2019 PLACE: E2.028 CHAIR: Rep. Tracy King HB 1311 Thompson, Senfronia Relating to the continuation and functions of the Texas Board of Professional Geoscientists. HB 1520 Thompson, Senfronia Relating to the continuation and functions of the Texas State Board of Public Accountancy. HB 1523 Nevárez Relating to the continuation of the regulation of land surveyors and the transfer of the regulation to the Texas Board of Professional Engineers and Land Surveyors, following the recommendations of the Sunset Advisory Commission; changing fees. HB 1670 Lambert Relating to the transfer of the regulation of plumbing to the Texas Department of Licensing and Regulation, following recommendations of the Sunset Advisory Commission; requiring an occupational license; authorizing a fee. HB 1675 Thompson, Senfronia Relating to the continuation and functions of the Texas Real Estate Commission and the Texas Appraiser Licensing and Certification Board; changing fees. HB 1544 Raymond | et al. Relating to fantasy sports contests. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
